SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am11
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am11.view.client.TUI

Class TuiUpdater

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am11.view.client.TUI.TuiUpdater
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientChatUpdater, ClientViewUpdater
public class TuiUpdater extends Object implements ClientViewUpdater, ClientChatUpdater
This class is the implementation of the ClientViewUpdater and the ExceptionConnector. The classes that handle the interpretation of the messages from the net will call these methods. There are also methods designed to be used by the Actuator (and possibly other classes) to update and get the TUIState and to save the candidateNick (the nickname that the player tries to send to the server)
